body: Yamerooo the story is bland just like the art bruh

What kind of idiot gives up a hot busty girl for an underdeveloped little sister?  You fuck your sister at home and fuck the busty girl at her home. And you tell them both a lie to keep them separated. See, easy peasy.
Dudes mad about hentai, Jesus christ please go outside
atleast have a better looking thumbnail ffs, that shit gives off 14 year old white girl vibes
Beautiful art but the dialogue is rushed and poorly written
Imagine fucking complaining on something that's given for you free...

To @purepure and the other people
There's reason that the credit page is in the first page and last page is because we upload this in mangadex.org and not here. I actually forgot to check the zip file and rearrange the credit page, however this is not a reason to talk bad about it. 
I can also talk bad about how you're reading this illegaly and not even supporting the author.
Big brain move. You need to put your group signature on every page as well to make sure nobody steals your work
People will just skip your doujin translate because they dont see girl on the cover. I think that putting translator page at the cover of doujin is counterproductive if you want to get to be known.

Yes. That's what I'm here for. What I'm not here to do is advertise myself in front of someone else's stuff. All I'm saying is that they took an already dubious practice and made it far shittier, while degrading the consumer's experience by obscuring the original thumbnail.
And yet you clicked on it to see it illegally, hypocrite.

I'd be grateful if i could see the original cover on the thumbnail. They aren't helping the poor, they are jacking someone else's shit and translating it. I've got no respect to someone who is advertising themselves on the front page of someone else's work.

Yall in the comments below me are a bunch of ungrateful fucks holy shit, these guys are doing this for free and one page at the start is literally nothing, yall arent paying a single penny for this doujin stop fucking unmotivate them show some fucking respect. Just read, be grateful and move on.
What the fuck is this shit? One pretentious credit page at the end wasn't enough, huh? Now they gotta have one on the front too.
I agree, please don't put the scan page as the front page.
God tier but scan page as front page is retarded.
Please dont put the scan page as the first page cover
Man this gave me the weird feels in my chest, I NEED MOAR OF THIS
Habsburg Intensifies
Short sweet and wholesome, wish we had more like this
